content.heading: Hola! Soy Pau Ib√°√±ez
content.info1: Este sitio web tiene todo lo que necesitas saber sobre m√≠ y mi trabajo. Te invito a explorarla mientras consideras tambi√©n su impacto como representaci√≥n de mi portfolio.
content.info2: Espero con entusiasmo la posibilidad de conectarme contigo y colaborar en proyectos interesantes.

presentation.title: <&>Mi<&> Portfolio
presentation.text:
Aqu√≠ encontrar√°s una selecci√≥n de <&>mi mejor trabajo hasta el momento<&>. Estos proyectos resaltan mi talento en <&>varias technolog√≠as<&> y muestran las respuestas a los problemas que me he encontrado construy√©ndolos. A lo largo de mi portfolio, notar√°s un fuerte <&>√©nfasis en los aspectos t√©cnicos<&>, soluciones innovadoras y desaf√≠os superados.
 
 La<&>calidad<&> es primordial para m√≠, as√≠ que aqu√≠ encontrar√°s la selecci√≥n de mi trabajo que mejor representa mis habilidades como desarrollador full-stack. Incluso si <&>no todos mis proyectos son sitios web<&> directamente, creo firmemente que <&>mi experiencia en estas otras plataformas me ayud√≥ a convertirme en un mejor desarrollador web<&> y me hace un mejor <&>problem solver<&>.

presentation.title: <&>Mi<&> Curriculum Vitae
presentation.text:
Take a look at my curriculum, you can explore my <&>educational background<&> and <&>professional experience<&>. Furthermore, I have dedicated a section to outline the various <&>technologies and skills<&> I‚Äôve worked with and developed over the years, along with my <&>proficiency level<&> in each of them. 
 
To ensure your <&>convenience<&>, I have also created a <&>compact version of my CV in PDF format<&>, which you can easily <&>download<&>. The download options can be found at the <&>bottom of this page<&>.

textSections.title: What I learned
textSections.text: During my tenure at the ISDI Coders bootcamp, I had the opportunity to work extensively with some of my favorite technologies, including React, Node, Express, MongoDB, and Git. The program played a crucial role in deepening my understanding of JavaScript, enabling me to enhance my coding efficiency and sharpen my troubleshooting skills.

textSections.title: Projects
textSections.text: Throughout my academic journey, I successfully completed a diverse range of projects, showcasing my expertise in various areas of software development. These projects encompassed front-end, back-end, and full-stack development, involving both native applications and framework-like apps.

items.name: Jesu√Øtes El Clot
items.concept: Professional Formation in Computer Systems and Networks

textSections.title: What I learned
textSections.text: In this course I learned the ins and outs of PCs and Server Systems. I built both hardware and software, from assembling a PC to creating an HTTP Apache server. We did a lot of system virtualization and we worked on HTTP, Static and SMTP servers. We also learned to correctly use the consoles in different Operating Systems as well as to create scripts for task automation with them.

textSections.title: Remarks
textSections.text: In this course, we did not have any programming classes, but I already loved it, so I spent a lot of free time in them trying out stuff. It‚Äôs while coursing in here that I was developing mini-games in unity.

textSections.title: My Tasks
textSections.text: I Developed a Full-Stack banking application with Flutter, Dart and Go. My responsibilities included the architecture of the front-end app, the styling, some design (both design creation of certain elements and design interpretation). Development of both front and back-end with user authentication including OAuth and user recovery.

textSections.title: My Tasks
textSections.text: I Provided top tier customer support for Google Workspace. I investigated bugs and errors in the program and provided workaround solutions to the clients if available. My tasks focused primarily on investigation and client communication for companies using Google Workspace. I also provided consults for lower tiers of support that were in charge of individual or smaller clients.

textSections.title: My Tasks
textSections.text: I installed and configured a customized Windows OS on hundreds of PC‚Äôs for their use in the vaccination posts during the pandemic.

textSections.title: My Tasks
textSections.text: I soldered and mounted logic boards for use in public transportation LED panels. I also mounted some of the LED panels themselves. Other than public transport, I configured and tested android players for their use in digital signage for hotels, companies‚Äô internal channels, shop showcases, restaurant menus...

languages.title: Languages
languages.text: These are the lanaguages I speak and write along with my level at them.

technologies.name: Technologies
technologies.title: Technbologies and Skills
technologies.text: These are my most developed technologies and methodologies with an added rating. Note that the ratings reflect my evaluation of my general knowledge and proficiency in each respective area. However, understand that a high rating does not mean I claim to know everything about the given skill.

sections.title: Critical <&>Thinking
sections.text: I possess a keen analytical mindset, evaluating information objectively and drawing logical conclusions.

sections.title: <&>Team<&>work
sections.text: I thrive in collaborative environments, fostering open communication, trust, and mutual respect. I actively contribute to group dynamics, valuing diverse perspectives and working towards shared goals.

sections.title: Problem <&>Thinking
sections.text: I excel at breaking down complex problems, anticipating obstacles, and devising innovative solutions. I strongly believe that troubleshooting is the most important skill to have as a programmer. No one's code always works the first time, and it's important to know how to find what's causing the error.

sections.title: <&>Flex<&>ibility
sections.text: I thrive in dynamic and changing environments. I embrace new challenges, willingly take on different roles, and effectively contribute to team objectives.

sections.title: De<&>sign (me, xd)
sections.text: I do not consider myself to be a designer, but I have an eye for it. I won‚Äôt create the best design, but I‚Äôll know when something doesn‚Äôt work right. I put myself in the position of the end user and I try to figure out the best layout and style for the desired  purpose of the page.

sections.title: <&>Fast <&>learning
sections.text: I think of myself as a fast learner. My experience with such varies technologies and developing enviroments allows me to adapt to new ones with ease.

items.name: Gunnar Kolbeinsson
items.letter:
It is my pleasure to recommend Pau Ib√°√±ez for employment.
 I was Pau‚Äôs immediate supervisor at Blikk Hugb√∫na√∞ar√æj√≥nusta hf. in Iceland. Pau was hired for a 2-month internship as a remote frontend developer and managed to deliver a prototype mobile application written in Dart with the Flutter framework, along with a backend server written in Go.

 We are a small open banking software company in Iceland applying for a financial license and looking to create a platform for open banking services. Unfortunately, we could not hire Pau full-time due to uncertainty regarding the operating license of the company and a lack of resources thereof.

 Pau is a talented and driven programmer. He managed to research and come up with solutions to problems and was very keen to figure out how to implement a number of different aspects of the prototype app. He even offered some interesting ideas on how to improve the codebase and coding in a somewhat immature development environment of our small and recently founded startup. He finished tasks according to plan, on time and according to specification and design immaculately.

 Pau is a very skilled communicator, both in written and spoken language. He is Spanish but speaks English fluently and with an excellent technical vocabulary. We communicated mostly on Slack but shared a Zoom call every few days and more often if needed. Pau had the initiative to propose some ideas of features to add to the project as well ideas for different implementations on some features. Pau could deliver those ideas concisely and clearly while still maintaining coding velocity. He was also very easy to get along with and chat with and is really friendly.

 Pau managed to complete his assignments brilliantly and made an impact on our organization despite his short tenure. I am confident that he will continue to grow as a programmer and make an impact everywhere he goes. Please feel free to contact me if there is anything you would like to discuss further with Pau Ib√°√±ez and I will happily have a chat.

 Best Regards 
 Gunnar Kolbeinsson
 Head of Product
 Blikk

download.title: Download
download.text: Having read or not my curriculum in this format, I‚Äôve prepared some PDF files so you can download them. These files contain my CV, a recommendation letter and a cover letter. You can also find the option to download them combined into a single PDF file.
download.disclaimer:
By downloading the files listed here, you are granted permission to store and review them. However, you are strictly prohibited from sharing these files without obtaining explicit written consent from me. If you wish to share these files with a 3rd party, please contact me to obtain the necessary permissions.

 Job search agencies are authorized to share the CV with the end employer company solely for the purpose of employment consideration. However, they must ensure the confidentiality and proper handling of the CV during the recruitment process.
download.checkmark: I accept the terms and conditions.

textSections.title: Quien <&>Soy<&>?
textSections.text: Soy <&>Pau Ib√°√±ez<&>, un programador de 21 a√±os de Barcelona, estoy especializado en desarrollo web <&>full-stack<&>. Siento una profunda motivaci√≥n por concebir ideas novedosas e innovadoras, sabiendo que en esta industria <&>nunca dejamos de aprender<&>. Me encanta ser un desarrollador porque me brinda la libertad de convertir mis ideas en realidad.

textSections.title: Jugador de <&>Equipo<&>
textSections.text:
M√°s all√° de mis proyectos individuales, he encontrado una gran satisfacci√≥n en <&>conectar con otros desarrolladores<&> y trabajar juntos como un <&>equipo<&>. 
 
 He trabajado en un par de proyectos internacionales donde pude <&>expandir mis habilidades al aprender y compartir con mis compa√±eros<&>. 
 
 Esta etapa de mi carrera se ha centrado principalmente en el desarrollo de juegos y modding, lo que me ayud√≥ a desarrollar mis habilidades como jugador de equipo y me demostr√≥ que <&>compartir tu c√≥digo e ideas siempre mejora el proyecto<&>.

textSections.title: <&>Perezoso<&> pero Ingenioso
textSections.text:
Soy <&>perezoso<&>, pero como programador considero que esta es <&>una habilidad excelente<&>. La pereza me impulsa a <&>encontrar soluciones eficientes y creativas<&> a problemas complejos. Creo en trabajar de forma m√°s eficiente, no en hacer un esfuerzo extra innecesario. 
 
 Ser perezoso no significa que comprometa la calidad; en cambio, encuentro formas de <&>optimizar<&> mi trabajo y eliminar tareas innecesarias o tediosas. ¬°Al final del d√≠a, de eso se trata la <&>optimizaci√≥n del flujo de trabajo<&>! 
 Por ejemplo, este texto podr√≠a o no haber sido creado con la ayuda de ChatGPT üòú. 
 
 Estoy dispuesto a pasar 5 horas trabajando en una soluci√≥n para una tarea de 1 hora si eso significa que nunca tendr√© que hacerla de nuevo.

textSections.title: <&>Mi<&> Trayectoria como Programador
textSections.text:
Desde que era peque√±o, me ha fascinado la programaci√≥n. Empec√© construyendo robots usando <&>Arduino<&> con <&>C++<&>. Con el tiempo, mi pasi√≥n se inclin√≥ hacia la creaci√≥n de juegos, comenzando con Scratch y finalmente encontrando <&>Unity<&>, donde desarroll√© mis habilidades en <&>C#<&>. Me sumerg√≠ en el aprendizaje de diferentes lenguajes de programaci√≥n basados en mis intereses del momento. Por ejemplo, explor√© <&>JavaScript<&> con (desafortunadamente) <&>JQuery<&> cuando constru√≠ mi primera interfaz de usuario, y aprend√≠ <&>Lua<&> y <&>SQL<&> mientras creaba modificaciones para videojuegos. Este viaje me ayud√≥ a convertirme en un <&>desarrollador full-stack vers√°til<&>, familiarizado con diversas plataformas y tecnolog√≠as. 
 
 A pesar de tener un conocimiento decente de diferentes lenguajes de programaci√≥n, me di cuenta de que mi codigo era desordenado y poco fiable. Fue entonces cuando decid√≠ inscribirme en el <&>ISDI Coders Bootcamp<&> en Barcelona. Durante tres ntensivos meses, me dediqu√© a desarrollar mis habilidades en <&>JavaScript y TypeScript<&>, especialmente utilizando el <&>MERN stack<&>, pasando 12 horas al d√≠a, siete d√≠as a la semana creando p√°ginas web y aplicaciones full-stack completas. El bootcamp no solo refin√≥ mis habilidades de codificaci√≥n, sino que tambi√©n me ense√±√≥ c√≥mo escribir codigo manteniendo la consistencia, buenas pr√°cticas y escalabilidad en mis aplicaciones. 
 
 Despu√©s de completar el bootcamp, consegu√≠ mi primer trabajo full-stack en Blikk, una startup bancaria de Islandia. Curiosamente, no pude utilizar los lenguajes de programaci√≥n que hab√≠a aprendido hasta ese momento. Sin embargo, mi experiencia previa en aprender nuevos lenguajes me prepar√≥ para el desaf√≠o y constru√≠ con √©xito una <&>aplicaci√≥n m√≥vil full-stack<&> utilizando <&>Dart<&> y <&>Flutter<&> para el frontend y <&>Golang<&> para el backend.

textSections.title: Bienvenido a <&>mi<&> p√°gina de contacto!
textSections.text:
Si tienes alguna pregunta o simplemente quieres <&>ponerte en contacto conmigo<&>, me encantaria conocernos. Si estas interesado en una <&>collaboraci√≥n<&> en tu proyecto, comentar una <&>oportunidad<&>, o simplemente quiieres <&>saludar<&>, este es el sitio donde hacerlo. Puedes contactarme a trav√©s del formulario y contestar√© lo antes posible. Tamb√©s puedes contacter directamente a trav√©s de mi email o numero de telefono. 
 
 <&>Muchas gr√°cias<&> por visitar mi portfolio website, <&>espero con ganas tu mensaje!<&>

textSections.title: Privacy Notice
textSections.text: By contacting me via this form or sending an email, you acknowledge and consent that the information you provide, including your name and email address, will be collected and stored for the purpose of responding to your inquiry.

contactInfo.title: Let‚Äôs get in touch!
contactInfo.text: Feel free to contact me directly through any of the options bellow:

Minigames.title: <&>Mini<&>juegos
Minigames.text: He agregado un par de minijuegos dise√±ados para ser <&>ligeros<&> y <&>r√°pidos<&>. ¬°Toma un descanso y <&>disfruta de desconectar un rato<&>!

memory.title: Memory
memory.text: El objetivo de este juego es emparejar cartas. Las cartas se colocan boca abajo, y debes voltearlas de dos en dos para encontrar las parejas. Debes recordar la posici√≥n de las cartas y completar todas las parejas en la menor cantidad de movimientos posible.¬°Prueba una dificultad m√°s alta para un desaf√≠o mayor!

simon.title: Simon
simon.text: El objetivo de este juego es repetir una secuencia de colores. Simon mostrar√° una secuencia, y debes repetirla presionando los botones correspondientes. El desaf√≠o consiste en recordar y replicar la secuencia con precisi√≥n durante el mayor tiempo posible.

projectCard.name: Minijuegos
projectCard.description: Un par de minijuegos para pasar el rato.

BackendTemplate.title: <&>Backend<&> template
BackendTemplate.text: I‚Äôve created a fully set up and tested REST API template complete with a database connection and full user support.

sections.title: Features
sections.text: The key features included in this template are:
features: User authentication with a boilerplate user schema.
Email service integration for user creation, verification and recovery.
Automated scripts for build, start, development watch build and testing.

sections.title: Users
sections.text: The template has user support built-in, these are the features it contains:
features: User registration with email verification. by email
User login via OTP via email.
sections.text2: The user autentication is built with JsonWebToken. The standard token session is 2h, but this is customizable to your needs.

sections.title: Testing
sections.text:
This template is fully tested with jest and SonarQube Scanner. This has a 100% coverage in unit tests plus some integration tests for the endpoints. 
 
 Testing commands:
features: <&>npm test<&> - This command will run all the tests once.
<&>npm run testCov<&> - This command will run al tests and the coverage in watch mode.
<&>npm run testCovNoWatch<&> - This command will run all tests and their coverage once.
sections.text2:
To run SonarQube Scanner and see a detialed breakdown of the tests, create a new SonarQube project with your prefeered settings. After thar update the sonar-project.propperties file with your project name and you are all set. 
 
 To run it simply, asuming u already have SonarQube up and running, run:

sections.title: Links
sections.text:
Feel free to visit the gitHub page and take a look at the code. 
 This repo is marked as a template so you can create your own API with a couple of clicks!

projectCard.description: Una API REST base, completa con base de datos y usuarios implementados.
